result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joey L Smith

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Joey L Smith in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.  Defendant Joey L Smith in custody. Brandon Wigley for Paul M. Hauer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Pursuant to plea negotiations and on motion of the State, Court ordered case dismissed and read-in to case 14CF3853 for the purposes of sentencing.

Defendant Joey L Smith in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.  Defendant Joey L Smith in custody.  Paul M. Hauer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Original Information previously filed September 10, 2014, filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty.
Defense requests case be set for Plea and Sentencing. Case is adjourned for Plea and Sentencing on 2-10-2015 at 8:30 a.m., Br. 17.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for February 10, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Vincent Paul Guimont in court, defendant Joey L Smith not in court, in custody.  Paul M. Hauer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case scheduled for Arraignment. Case held off the record as Br. 17 is in a Jury Trial on another matter. Case is adjourned for Arraignment on 2-5-2015 at 8:30 a.m., Br. 17.  Arraignment scheduled for February 5, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Joey L Smith in court with attorney Vincent Guimont.  Defendant Joey L Smith in custody.  Michael White, student intern under the supervision of Marissa Santiago for Paul M. Hauer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Stark, Branch 17.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pleads not guilty.  Arraignment scheduled for February 3, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  
ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/DEFENDANT to be monitored by drug testing.
Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.
Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with: 2460 West Brown Street.

Defendant Joey L Smith in court with attorney Christian Thomas Eichenlaub.  Defendant Joey L Smith in custody.  Sarra M. Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Stark, Branch 17.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 28, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Joey L Smith
Current: 3930 N 65th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53216   (Effective: 01-10-2015)
Prior: 2460 West Brown Street, Milwaukee, WI 53206
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
